name: Predator Scattergun
name_cn: 捕食者 实弹霰弹炮
description:
Manufacturer: Apocalypse Arms
Item Type: Ballistic Scattergun
Size: 3
The Predator scattergun preys upon nearby opponents with an overwhelming barrage of ballistic ammo. The size three version of Apocalypse Arms' feared scattergun trades effective range for a wide spread.
description_cn:
制造商：启示录军备(Apocalypse Arms)
物品类型：实弹霰弹炮
尺寸：3
"捕食者"霰弹炮能够使用它那势不可挡的实弹弹幕来捕食附近的敌人.这门来自启示录军备令人畏惧的尺寸3霰弹炮牺牲了有效射程以换取更广的打击散布面.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-十字军(Crusader)-奥里森(Orison)-乌鸦表哥
